title: Username Correlator
description:
During an investigation, you discover a suspect uses the username 'darkphoenix_42' on one platform. You need to check if the same username exists on other social media platforms.

What popular open-source Python tool checks for the existence of a username across 400+ social networks simultaneously?

Submit as: flag{tool_name} (lowercase)
hints: This tool is named after a famous fictional detective
It's available on GitHub and written in Python
